  Quatro had an uneasy feeling, like somebody was coming after him.  It was=
 strange, but, but, well, you know(actually, you don't).  Quatro decided to=
 get out of the Decepticon base.  But, he'd have to attack and fight his wa=
y out.  Quatro cut a square in the vent, and popped down right in the room =
where Slaughter and some other Decepticons were.

    "That's that organic =
I heard....." Quatro said to himself.

      Quatro pulled out a plasma pis=
tol, and shot two rounds at Motormaster.

      MEanwhile, Slaughter saw th=
is.  He didn't know who this guy was, but decided to use this to further co=
nvince Motormaster that Squawktalk was a traitor and that he was on the Dec=
epticon's side.  Slaughter jumped in the way, and the two plasma shots dug =
into his skin.  Slime and flesh flew everywhere.

      "RRAAAHH!!!" Slaugh=
ter yelled in the pain that he purprosely took.  (whoops, spelt purposely w=
rong.)

      "KILL DECEPTICON HATER!  KILL!" Slaughter yelled.

      Slau=
ghter extened a pincir at Quatro, but Quatro avoided it.  Quatro ran for th=
e entrance, and got the hell outta there.  Then, Quatro transformed into ho=
verbike mode and sped off to the Maximal base......
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     And just then, from behind, Slaughter was hit by =
Motormaster's backhand, and stumbled forward.

     Slaughter kept his mind=
 connected with Motormaster's and decided to try harder.

     "Listen to m=
e, I am the mental conscience that lies within all transformers.  Realise, =
that this organic is on your side, it will just take time to get used to...=
...Don't let the truth put you in anger and disbelief.....Sometimes the tru=
th is hard..........." Skulletron's voice said in Motormaster's head.

    =
